Procs

proc convert(file: string; fromType: Option[FileType]; to: FileType;
             options: Option[ConvertOptions]): ConvertResult {...}{.raises: [
    MissingTypeException, ValueError, ParseError, KeyError, IOError, OSError,
    PreserveFileException, ConvertException, MissingConversionException,
    JsonKindError, JsonParsingError, Exception, InvalidTypeException],
    tags: [ReadIOEffect, ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect, WriteIOEffect].}
Converts the provided file to the requested output-format (to). If the fromType is not provided, it'll attempt to detect it from the file via the _detectFileType func. If no options are provided, it'll get the default options for the output-type (to) via the _getDefaultOptions func.   Source Edit
